issue.title: [Rust] Array::from missing mapping for u8 type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2425](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2425). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Macros are used to support Array::from for each primitive type but u8 was missing

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2425?focusedCommentId=16431922) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1865
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1865>
